Class Turret

java.lang.Object
turrets.Turret
Direct Known Subclasses:
LongRangeTurret, StandardTurret
public abstract class Turret extends Object
Abstract base class for all defensive turrets.

This class defines the common properties of turrets such as attack power, range, cost, and cooldowns. It also manages global upgrades for turret stats.

  • Field Details

    • DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER

      protected static final double DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Turret

      public Turret(int attack, int range, int cost)
      Initializes a new Turret with specified attack power, range, and cost. Sets the default cooldown to 1.5 seconds and last attack time to 0.
      Parameters:
      attack - The attack damage of the turret.
      range - The firing range of the turret.
      cost - The purchase cost of the turret.

  • Method Details

    • calculateDamage

      public abstract int calculateDamage(Attackable target)
      Calculates the damage this turret deals to a specific target.
      Parameters:
      target - The target Attackable entity.
      Returns:
      The calculated damage amount.

    • applyVariance

      protected int applyVariance(int baseDamage)
      Applies a random variance to the base damage. The variation is between 0.75 and 1.25 of the base damage.
      Parameters:
      baseDamage - The initial damage amount.
      Returns:
      The damage after applying variance.

    • canFire

      public boolean canFire(long now)
      Checks if the turret is ready to fire based on its cooldown. Updates the last attack time if it fires.
      Parameters:
      now - The current game time in nanoseconds.
      Returns:
      true if the cooldown has elapsed, false otherwise.

    • resetCooldown

      public void resetCooldown(long now)
      Resets the cooldown timer to the current time.
      Parameters:
      now - The current game time in nanoseconds.

    • resetUpgrades

      public static void resetUpgrades()
      Resets the static upgrade flags for all turrets to false.

    • getAttack

      public int getAttack()
      Returns the attack damage of the turret, applying the upgrade multiplier if active.
      Returns:
      The effective attack damage.

    • getRange

      public int getRange()
      Returns the range of the turret, applying the upgrade multiplier if active.
      Returns:
      The effective range.

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Returns the cost of the turret.
      Returns:
      The cost.

    • getCooldown

      public long getCooldown()
      Returns the cooldown duration of the turret in nanoseconds.
      Returns:
      The cooldown duration.

    • getLastAttackTime

      public long getLastAttackTime()
      Returns the timestamp of the last attack in nanoseconds.
      Returns:
      The last attack time.

    • setAttack

      public void setAttack(int attack)
      Sets the base attack damage of the turret.
      Parameters:
      attack - The new attack value (must be non-negative).

    • setRange

      public void setRange(int range)
      Sets the base range of the turret.
      Parameters:
      range - The new range value (must be non-negative).

    • setCost

      public void setCost(int cost)
      Sets the cost of the turret.
      Parameters:
      cost - The new cost value (must be non-negative).

    • setCooldown

      public void setCooldown(long cooldown)
      Sets the cooldown duration of the turret.
      Parameters:
      cooldown - The new cooldown duration in nanoseconds (must be non-negative).

    • setLastAttackTime

      public void setLastAttackTime(long lastAttackTime)
      Sets the timestamp of the last attack.
      Parameters:
      lastAttackTime - The new last attack time (must be non-negative).

    • isUpgradedAttack

      public static boolean isUpgradedAttack()
      Checks if the turret attack upgrade is active.
      Returns:
      true if upgraded, false otherwise.

    • setUpgradedAttack

      public static void setUpgradedAttack(boolean upgradedAttack)
      Sets the status of the turret attack upgrade.
      Parameters:
      upgradedAttack - The new upgrade status.

    • isUpgradedRange

      public static boolean isUpgradedRange()
      Checks if the turret range upgrade is active.
      Returns:
      true if upgraded, false otherwise.

    • setUpgradedRange

      public static void setUpgradedRange(boolean upgradedRange)
      Sets the status of the turret range upgrade.
      Parameters:
      upgradedRange - The new upgrade status.
